NPM to R!

Import my little utils library as a demo

maya_utils = import('https://cdn.skypack.dev/maya_utils@1.0.9?min')

Create an observable button using viewof

viewof new_arr = Inputs.button("New Array")

call the button in R using input$new_arr and do R stuff, then send that R reactive back to JS using ojs_define

Now we can run the function removeDuplicates that we imported from the maya_utils library on our R array!

maya_utils.removeDuplicates(my_array)
